Subject: The pod is ours, by peace or otherwise...

::The Oblitercons::

"Stand back, Predacons," Dark One's voice sounds as he flies into the crater 
with the pod, "That pod is Alliance property."

He flies in, his gun ready as he lands near the pod. Behind him, the 
Oblitercons emerge from the woods, standing with their weapons ready as well.
